mapper.insert: INSERT INTO house (title, price, area, room, floor, total_floor, watch_times, build_year, status, create_time, last_update_time, city_en_name, region_en_name, cover, direction, distance_to_subway, parlour, district, admin_id, bathroom, street) VALUES (#{title}, #{price}, #{area}, #{room}, #{floor}, #{totalFloor}, #{watchTimes}, #{buildYear}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{cityEnName}, #{regionEnName}, #{cover}, #{direction}, #{distanceToSubway}, #{parlour}, #{district}, #{adminId}, #{bathroom}, #{street})
